Figma Slides

The first presentation tool built for designers and their teams.

Try Figma Slides for free

TRUSTED BY THE WORLD’S LEADING TEAMS

The power of Figma, made easy for everyone

Figma Slides makes it easier than ever for teams to co-create narratives, engage their audience, and craft impressive slide decks using the power of Figma Design.

Create presentations like a pro

Build your deck in a simple, easy-to-use interface, or toggle over to Design Mode to access Figma Design favorites like Auto Layout, the layers panel, and advanced properties.

All hands on deck

Build on-brand presentations with templates, theming, and AI-powered writing tools. Switch between Single Slide and Grid View to think visually within a structured framework.

Turn presentations into conversations

Encourage two-way conversations and drive alignment with live polls, alignment scales, and voting. Plus, you can even embed live prototypes to share design interactivity.

Six Figma Slides features we think you’ll love
Showcase interactive designs

Add playable prototypes to your deck to bring your products to life.

See the big picture with grid view

Zoom out to see your entire presentation from a bird’s eye view. Easily group multiple slides and move sections of your presentation.

Toggle on Design mode

Toggle on Figma Design tools for easy access to Auto Layout, advanced properties, and all of your favorite design features.

Fine tune copy in minutes with AI

Easily dial up the tone of your text to be shorter or longer, more professional or more casual.

Slide into alignment with your team

Tease out misalignment with the Alignment Scale. Quickly find out where you’re good to go, and where you need to do more digging.

Present confidently

See your presenter notes and preview the next slide—all within Presenter View. A tiny step toward getting rid of “ummms...” forever.

Get started with a stunning template

No matter what kind of presentation you’re gearing up for, we have high-quality slide templates to help you get started.

Explore all templates

Stack the deck with Figma Slides

For presentations that actually move the needle, our new slide tool combines the power and precision of Figma with the collaborative spirit of FigJam.

Learn more

Getting started with Figma Slides

Figma Slides is built for everyone. Not sure where to start? Here’s a helpful video tutorial to get you going.

Stories about how products take shape—and shape our world
Design and prototype in one place
The first presentation tool built for designers and their teams.
TRUSTED BY THE WORLD’S LEADING TEAMS
Figma Slides makes it easier than ever for teams to co-create narratives, engage their audience, and craft impressive slide decks using the power of Figma Design.
Build your deck in a simple, easy-to-use interface, or toggle over to Design Mode to access Figma Design favorites like Auto Layout, the layers panel, and advanced properties.
Build on-brand presentations with templates, theming, and AI-powered writing tools. Switch between Single Slide and Grid View to think visually within a structured framework.
Encourage two-way conversations and drive alignment with live polls, alignment scales, and voting. Plus, you can even embed live prototypes to share design interactivity.
Add playable prototypes to your deck to bring your products to life.
Zoom out to see your entire presentation from a bird’s eye view. Easily group multiple slides and move sections of your presentation.
Toggle on Figma Design tools for easy access to Auto Layout, advanced properties, and all of your favorite design features.
Easily dial up the tone of your text to be shorter or longer, more professional or more casual.
Tease out misalignment with the Alignment Scale. Quickly find out where you’re good to go, and where you need to do more digging.
See your presenter notes and preview the next slide—all within Presenter View. A tiny step toward getting rid of “ummms...” forever.
No matter what kind of presentation you’re gearing up for, we have high-quality slide templates to help you get started.
For presentations that actually move the needle, our new slide tool combines the power and precision of Figma with the collaborative spirit of FigJam.
Figma Slides is built for everyone. Not sure where to start? Here’s a helpful video tutorial to get you going.
Discover and use presentation templates crafted by the best and brightest in our Figma community.
